setMinAutoRowCount.!description: Sets a new value for property minAutoRowCount. This property is used to set the minimum count of visible rows when the property visibleRowCountMode is set to Auto or Interactive. For any other visibleRowCountMode, it is ignored. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is 5.

insertExtension.!description: Inserts a extension into the aggregation named extension.

setEnableCustomFilter.!description: Sets a new value for property enableCustomFilter. Set this parameter to true to implement your own filter behaviour. Instead of the filter input box a button will be rendered for which' press event (customFilter) you can register an event handler. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

bindColumns.!description: Binds aggregation columns to model data. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#bindAggregation ManagedObject.bindAggregation} for a detailed description of the possible properties of oBindingInfo.

getFirstVisibleRow.!description: Gets current value of property firstVisibleRow. First visible row. Default value is 0.

indexOfCell.!description: Checks for the provided sap.ui.core.Control in the aggregation named cells. and returns its index if found or -1 otherwise.

getCells.!description: Gets content of aggregation cells. The controls for the cells.

insertCell.!description: Inserts a cell into the aggregation named cells.

destroyCells.!description: Destroys all the cells in the aggregation named cells.

getIndex.!description:
Returns the index of the row in the table or -1 if not added to a table. This
function considers the scroll position of the table and also takes fixed rows and
fixed bottom rows into account.

addCell.!description: Adds some cell into the aggregation named cells.

removeAllCells.!description: Removes all the controls in the aggregation named cells. Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.

removeCell.!description: Removes a cell from the aggregation named cells.

Multi.!description: Select multiple rows at a time.

Single.!description: Select one row at a time.

getAutoSave.!description: Gets current value of property autoSave. Auto save state Default value is true.

getTable.!description: ID of the element which is the current target of the table association, or null. The target table of this controller.

setPersoService.!description:
Sets a new value for property persoService. Personalization Service object. Needs to have the following methods:
  • getPersData() : jQuery Promise (http://api.jquery.com/promise/)
  • setPersData(oBundle) : jQuery Promise (http://api.jquery.com/promise/)
  • delPersData() : jQuery Promise (http://api.jquery.com/promise/)
When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

setCustomDataKey.!description: Sets a new value for property customDataKey. By defining a custom data key the TablePersoController will try to get the key for saving the perso data from the custom data of the Table and Column instead of creating it by concatenating the ID of the Table and the Column. Basically this will be more stable than using the auto IDs. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is persoKey.

sap.ui.table.TablePersoController.!description: The TablePersoController can be used to connect a table with a persistence service.

setAutoSave.!description: Sets a new value for property autoSave. Auto save state When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

getPersoService.!description:
Gets current value of property persoService. Personalization Service object. Needs to have the following methods:
  • getPersData() : jQuery Promise (http://api.jquery.com/promise/)
  • setPersData(oBundle) : jQuery Promise (http://api.jquery.com/promise/)
  • delPersData() : jQuery Promise (http://api.jquery.com/promise/)

getCustomDataKey.!description: Gets current value of property customDataKey. By defining a custom data key the TablePersoController will try to get the key for saving the perso data from the custom data of the Table and Column instead of creating it by concatenating the ID of the Table and the Column. Basically this will be more stable than using the auto IDs. Default value is persoKey.

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.table.AnalyticalColumnMenu with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.table.ColumnMenu.extend}.

Interactive.!description: After rendering the table has as many rows as defined in visibleRowCount property. The user is able to change the visible rows by moving a grip with the mouse. The visibleRowCount property is changed accordingly.

Auto.!description: The table automatically fills the height of the surrounding container. The visibleRowCount property is automatically changed accordingly. All rows need the same height, otherwise the auto mode doesn't always work as expected.

Fixed.!description: The table always has as many rows as defined in the visibleRowCount property.
